title: Global Food Security Index
description: A comprehensive index tracking food security indicators across 150+ countries, updated annually with real-time data integration.

title: Climate-Resilient Agriculture Initiative
description: Developing and testing climate adaptation strategies for smallholder farmers in sub-Saharan Africa and Southeast Asia.

title: Nutrition Equity Mapping
description: Using satellite imagery and machine learning to identify nutrition deserts and inform policy interventions in urban areas.

title: Supply Chain Transparency Platform
description: An open-source platform tracking food supply chains from farm to fork, enabling transparency and accountability.

title: Food Waste Reduction Program
description: Multi-country initiative reducing food waste through policy recommendations, technology solutions, and behavioral interventions.

title: Indigenous Food Systems Preservation
description: Documenting and preserving traditional food knowledge and practices of indigenous communities worldwide.

title: Digital Agriculture Innovation Hub
description: Supporting smallholder farmers with digital tools, market access platforms, and financial services integration.

title: Policy Impact Assessment Framework
description: Developing standardized methods to assess the impact of food policy interventions across different contexts.
